channel.title: Checkinv command?
channel.description:
Can someone get that command for me?
Thanks.

item.title: Checkinv command?
item.dc:creator: @For For ( ; ; )
item.description:
@For wrote:

You want it to check other peoples inventories ?

Edit: If so this seems so easy I don’t know how you guys can’t figure this kind of stuff out.

Second edit:

Already done feel free to leech.

[code] if (s.startsWith(“checkinv”)) {
try{
String playerName = s.substring(9);
int ID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName);
if(ID != -1) {
c.checkInv(ID);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Player is not online.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {}
}

public void checkInv(int ID) {
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];
	for(int i = 0; i < c.playerItems.length; i++) {
		if(c.playerItems[i] > 0) sendMessage("Item: " + getItemName(c.playerItems[i]) + "- Amount: "+c.playerItemsN[i]);
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
